about_the_game:
The DB Sgns Container Wagon Pack recreates the modern and versatile style of multimodal freight vehicles increasingly used across Europe. Each wagon is capable of accepting containers of various types and sizes. Their multimodal concept results in faster turnaround times and more flexible working arrangements for the hauliers.

The DB Sgns Container Wagon Pack for Train Simulator Marketplace includes the following rail vehicles as operated by DB:

  • With red containers (small)
  • With red containers (large)
  • With yellow containers (small)
  • With yellow containers (large)
  • Empty

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:512 MB - 1GB with Pixel Shader 3.0 (AGP PCIe only)

  • Hard Drive:40 GB HD space
